title: Reliance Jio invests $15 million in US-based deep-tech startup 'Two Platforms' for 25% stake - Economic Times
content: Reliance Jio invests $15 million in US-based deep-tech startup 'Two Platforms' for 25% stake  Economic Times
description: Jio Platforms (JPL) has invested $15 million in US tech firm Two Platforms Inc. for a 25% equity stake on a fully diluted basis. The investments come in at a time when Mukesh Ambani led telco is betting big on artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning and 5G to bring in the next generation of technology based solutions. “Jio Platforms Limited today announced an investment of US$ 15 million in Two Platforms Inc., a Silicon Valley based deep tech startup founded by Pranav Mistry, for a 25% equity stake on a fully diluted basis,” said the telco.
